My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Doctor bot is a diseases diagnosis web application made with flask-python. This is an attempt to predict diseases from the given symptoms. A decision tree was trained on two datasets, one had the scraped data from here. This dataset is uncleaned so preprocessing is done and then model is trained and tested on it.
